name: Verify the get details of bitly with invalid guid

testSteps.description: Given I send a request to endpoint of Get Bitly invalid Guid

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Server: nginx
Date: Mon, 18 Apr 2022 22:48:12 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 112
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=blockFilter
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none
Via: 1.1 google
Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=2592000,h3-29=":443"; ma=2592000

testSteps.description: When the API should return status 403
Then Verify the get bitly error Response

title: Verify the get details of bitly with invalid guid
